The authors suggest using this prompt with [Bing](https://www.bing.com/), as this activity requires (benefits greatly from) access to the Internet.

You can also use this prompt with [Bard](https://bard.google.com/).






## Tasks

- Explore prompting, using both ChatGPT and the Playground. 
- Try the PromptTools Playground.
- Try out SPARK. This is a good deomonstration of using a knowledge base and document retrieval can allow you to create a QA tool.
